document.full_text: as underclassmen weigh the consequences of leaving early, some college coaches, n.b.a. front-office members and agents are not exactly sure how, and to what extent, the labor situation will ultimately affect the draft class.
document.title: n.b.a. prospects are facing uncertainty over declaring
lines_and_colors: as underclassmen weigh the consequences of leaving early, some college coaches, n.b.a. front-office members and agents are not exactly sure how, and to what extent, the labor situation will ultimately affect the draft class.
